articles.title: Indiana begins effort to pass legislation to pay for new Bears stadium - NBC Sports
articles.description: As the Bears prepare to play a significant postseason game in their longtime home of Soldier Field, the process of finding a new home continues.
articles.content:

articles.title: Rare earths magnets: How realistic are India's its ambitions? - BBC
articles.description: India has a $800m plan to make rare earth magnets, aiming to reduce dependence on Chinese imports - but can it work?
articles.content:
India hopes to make its own rare earth magnets for domestic use
In November 2025, India approved a 73bn-rupee ($800m; £600m) plan that could help it to cut its dependence on China in one of the most… [+5511 chars]
